fullText: This vigorous stage adaptation of Green Day's 2004 concept album manages to turn what was essentially an extended temper tantrum into a surprisingly moving coming-of-age story.
dtliExcerpt: This vigorous stage adaptation of Green Day's 2004 concept album manages to turn what was essentially an extended temper tantrum into a surprisingly moving coming-of-age story.
